message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale. I believe it would be very valuable to you. What do you think about a price of $130?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $110. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your position, but $110 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $120?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still unable to go above $110 for the product. Could we perhaps meet somewhere in between?
